member.name: T:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient
member.summary: Defines the properties and methods used to access the NWS Alert API.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initalizes an instance of the ApiClient class with the specified User-Agent string.
member.param: The User-Agent string use to authenticate the API

member.name: P:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.Endpoint
member.summary: Gets the API endpoint.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetAlerts(NwsAlertApi.AlertFilters)
member.summary: Returns the alerts specified by the parameter.
member.param: The parameters used to specify the alerts to retrieve.
member.returns: List of objects that contain the alerts specified.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetEventTypes
member.summary: Gets the list of event types used by the NWS.
member.returns: A list of strings that contains the event types.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetOffice(System.String)
member.summary: Gets information about the specified office.
member.returns: An object that contains the office information.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetStates
member.summary: Gets the list of available state and territory codes.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetZones(NwsAlertApi.GeographicArea,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the zones for the specified area.
member.param: Determines if geographic data is returned back.
member.returns: A list of objects that contains the zones in the specified area.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetZones(NwsAlertApi.GeographicArea,System.Boolean,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the zones for the specified area.
member.param: Determines if geographic data is returned back.
The effective date of the zones.
member.returns: A list of objects that contains the zones in the specified area.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetZones(NwsAlertApi.GeographicArea,System.Boolean,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the zones for the specified area.
member.param: Determines if geographic data is returned back.
The effective date of the zones.
The maximum nuber of zones to retrieve.
member.returns: A list of objects that contains the zones in the specified area.

member.name: M:NwsAlertApi.ApiClient.GetZones(NwsAlertApi.GeographicArea,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the zones for the specified area.
member.param: Determines if geographic data is returned back.
The maximum nuber of zones to retrieve.
member.returns: A list of objects that contains the zones in the specified area.

member.summary: A geometry represented in Well-Known Text (WKT) format.

member.name: P:NwsAlertApi.Zone.ID
member.summary: UGC identifier for a NWS forecast zone or county.

remarks.para: The first two letters will correspond to either a state code or marine area code (see #/components/schemas/StateTerritoryCode and #/components/schemas/MarineAreaCode for lists of valid letter combinations).
The third letter will be Z for public/fire zone or C for county.
